summary: This package contains a collection of launch scripts that initialize tokenizers, configure model and retrieval components via Hydra, and start various NeMo Megatron‑based services such as BERT sentence embedding, combo/dynamic/static retrieval, RETRO text generation, and a web demo server for language models.
business_intent: Provide ready‑to‑run entry points for deploying large‑scale NLP services (embedding, retrieval, generation, and interactive demos) in production or research environments, simplifying model serving and integration into downstream applications.
